page.title: 10THE LANGUAGE OF BALMEDIE
page.content: We speak a lot of different forms of language in Balmedie.In the classroom we speak a standard form of English. At home we speak in a scottish dialect and in the playground we also speak in a scottish dialect.People in the community who like different forms of music are called different types of names.Those who like the music of Michael Jackson are called Posers. Others are called,Casuals,mods and heavies.We also have "In-words",some of which are,hippies,wallys,wimps, smart,keen and aceic. These are some examples of old scottish words, REEK=SMOKE, FEEL=IDIOT SHELTIES=PONIES, DOUP=BACKSIDE MUCKING OUT=CLEANING, FIT LIKE= HOW ARE YOU.We think that the scottish language is much better than standard English.
